title: Rite Aid (RAD) Announces  Earnings Results, Misses Expectations By $0.02 EPS
content:
Rite Aid (NYSE:RAD) released its quarterly earnings results on Thursday. The company reported $0.02 earnings per share (EPS) for the quarter, missing the Zacks’ consensus estimate of $0.04 by $0.02, MarketBeat reports. The company had revenue of $7.70 billion for the quarter, compared to the consensus estimate of $7.55 billion. Rite Aid (NYSE:RAD) opened at […] 
 
The post appeared first on Ticker Report .
